data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ahrens, Dirk (2005): Description of the two new Microserica species from Laos and Thailand (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae: Sericini). Zootaxa 1064: 31-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170218
